title: Technology Utilization and Learning Skill Enhancement Strategies: A Scientific Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general computer literacy
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers performing administrative tasks who engage in asynchronous learning using personal devices (BYOD), with course design emphasizing cognitive load management strategies for technology use

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of technology usage types (video games, internet searches, smartphone utilization) on learning skills (abstract conceptualization, concrete experience, reflective observation, active experimentation) through structural equation modeling
Learners can design personalized strategies for strategically controlling technology use to enhance learning skills
Learners can evaluate effective learning strategies considering cognitive load in technological environments through scientific methodologies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
